title: What time does Isha start? Redness in sky disappears but App says Isha starts after one hour?
transcript: pozan from indonesia he says in my country after sunset the redness in the west where the sun had set remains between 20 to 25 minutes and then it disappears but the app says that isha time starts after one hour so what should we do the prophet told us once the redness disappears this is the time of rasha you do not depend or rely on the app as long as you've seen the redness disappearing and there are no reason for such a disappearance other than it is the time of russia then you have to pray asia then
